Name: My Pet Sitter is a Futanari
About the game: Complaints from the neighbors have forced you to get a Pet Sitter to look after your dog while you're out for long periods of time. The Pet Sitter is practically a dog whisperer and knows everything there is to know about the psychology of the canine variety. She adores your four-legged friend and also seems to have taken a liking to you. Can your Pet Sitter teach an old dog new tricks? Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions. Gameplay Kinetic Visual Novel H-Scenes Sexy Voice Acting ~5K words Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.
